mapper.insert: INSERT /* projwork.insertProjWork */ INTO TB_PROJ_WORK (PROJ_ID, EMP_ID, WORK_DT, WORK_STAT_CD, REG_DTM, MOD_DTM) SELECT #{PROJ_ID}, #{EMP_ID}, A.YYYY_MM_DD, #{WORK_STAT_CD}, NOW(), NOW() FROM TB_CALENDAR A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.HOLIDAY_YN = '0' AND A.YYYY_MM_DD BETWEEN #{START_DT} AND #{END_DT} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TB_PROJ_WORK WHERE PROJ_ID = #{PROJ_ID} AND EMP_ID = #{EMP_ID} AND WORK_DT = A.YYYY_MM_DD )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* employ.updateEmp */ TB_EMP SET EMAIL = IFNULL(#{EMAIL}, EMAIL) ,PASSWD = IFNULL(#{PASSWD}, PASSWD) ,EMP_NM = IFNULL(#{EMP_NM}, EMP_NM) ,EMP_NO = IFNULL(#{EMP_NO}, EMP_NO) ,MNG_LVL = IFNULL(#{MNG_LVL}, MNG_LVL) ,ENT_DT = IFNULL(#{ENT_DT}, ENT_DT) ,MOD_DTM = NOW() WHERE 1 = 1 AND EMP_ID = #{EMP_ID}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* projwork.deleteProjWork */ TB_PROJ_WORK WHERE 1 = 1 AND EMP_ID = #{EMP_ID}
